about_the_game:
Lament of Kyoto is an Action Roguelike where you fight waves of Yokai in feudal Japan inspired by Vampire Survivors and Holocure. Along your journey you will find unlikely allies, discover secrets and hidden locations and plenty of weapons to fight your way to victory. Upgrade these weapons by combining your special Esper Powers with the lingering Yokai energy to create even crazier weapons!

Content included in the Early Access Version

  • Unique maps with their own gameplay elements and style
  • Characters with unique starting weapons and skills to support their playstyle
  • Many weapons to vanquish all Yokai in your path
  • Passives to power up your Esper Powers
  • Beautiful Japanese aesthetics
  • Music inspired by our favorite Touhou tracks
  • MORE. Lots of content (weapons, mechanics, characters, bosses, maps, etc) will get added over time

  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870

short_description: Lament of Kyoto is an Action Rogue-lite with light horror elements. Fight endless waves of horrifying yokai while exploring the haunted remains of feudal Japan. Recruit unlikely allies, discover secrets and vanquish powerful bosses to upgrade your weapons and abilities.
